alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County; Northeast Clark County; Sheep Range; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 06 at 12:36AM PST until January 07 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In California, Death Valley National Park and Owens Valley. In Nevada, Esmeralda and Central Nye County, Lincoln County, Northeast Clark County, Sheep Range, and Western Clark and Southern Nye County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County; Northeast Clark County; Sheep Range; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
